### About

I am a PhD student in Health Economics and Policy at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. My research focuses on health economics, population health, and political economy. Prior to graduate school, I worked as an Analyst at AmeriHealth Caritas, supporting data-driven decisions for managed care plans.

### Education

      Ithaca College - Ithaca, New York

            *BA in Economics & BS in Public and Community Health, 2022*

      Johns Hopkins University - Baltimore, Maryland

            *PhD in Health Economics & Policy, 2027 (expected)*
